keyMoments.title: Nami Arrives on Weatheria
keyMoments.description: After being sent flying by Bartholomew Kuma, Nami finds herself on Weatheria, an artificial sky island dedicated to weather research. She is rescued and housed by the elderly weather scientists led by Haredas.
keyMoments.significance: Begins Nami's journey on Weatheria, where she will eventually spend two years training to become a master of weather manipulation.
keyMoments.quote: Where am I? This place... it's floating in the sky!

keyMoments.title: Nami Learns About Weather Balls
keyMoments.description: Haredas introduces Nami to Weather Balls, specialized plants that can store pieces of clouds and create weather phenomena. Nami immediately recognizes their potential as weapons, though Haredas warns against such use.
keyMoments.significance: This technology becomes fundamental to Nami's post-timeskip weapon, the Sorcery Clima-Tact, transforming her combat capabilities.
keyMoments.quote: Could these be made into weapons?

keyMoments.title: Nami Decides to Learn Weather Science
keyMoments.description: After witnessing the power of Weatheria's weather manipulation technology, Nami decides to stay on the island and learn from the scientists rather than trying to leave immediately.
keyMoments.significance: This decision sets the foundation for Nami's two-year training during the timeskip, transforming her from a navigator with basic weather knowledge into a master meteorologist.
keyMoments.quote: If I'm going to be stuck here anyway, I might as well learn everything I can about weather!

reveals.information: Nami's location after being separated from the crew is revealed to be Weatheria
Nami plans to learn weather science from Weatheria's scientists

keyMoments.title: Franky Arrives on Karakuri Island
keyMoments.description: After being sent flying by Bartholomew Kuma, Franky finds himself on Karakuri Island (Future Country Baldimore), Dr. Vegapunk's birthplace. He is immediately chased by aggressive cyborg animals.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the location where Franky will spend the timeskip and discover the technology that enables his massive upgrades.
keyMoments.quote: Cyborg animals?! What is this place?!

keyMoments.title: Franky Defeats Cyborg Animals
keyMoments.description: After his personality returns to normal, Franky battles and defeats the cyborg animals pursuing him, demonstrating his combat capabilities against Vegapunk's creations.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Franky can hold his own against advanced technology, and provides an anime-original action scene.
keyMoments.quote: That's more like it! Time to show these tin cans what a SUPER cyborg can do!

keyMoments.title: Franky Discovers Vegapunk's Laboratory
keyMoments.description: Franky stumbles upon Dr. Vegapunk's abandoned laboratory, filled with technological innovations and blueprints. An alarm sounds as he enters, foreshadowing future complications.
keyMoments.significance: This discovery is pivotal for Franky's character development. The technology he finds here will enable his post-timeskip upgrades and greatly enhance his capabilities as the Straw Hats' shipwright.
keyMoments.quote: Vegapunk?! So this is where that genius scientist worked!

reveals.information: Franky's location after being separated from the crew is revealed to be Karakuri Island, Dr. Vegapunk's birthplace
Franky discovers Dr. Vegapunk's abandoned laboratory

keyMoments.title: Haredas Demonstrates Weather Control for Profit
keyMoments.description: Haredas demonstrates his weather manipulation abilities by offering to create rain for a drought-stricken island. He negotiates payment, initially asking for 100,000,000 berries but quickly lowering it to 100 berries.
keyMoments.significance: Shows how Weatheria's scientists use their knowledge to help people and make a living, establishing Haredas as a practical yet kind-hearted scientist.
keyMoments.quote: 100,000,000 berries! ...Actually, that's too much. How about 100?

keyMoments.title: Haredas Introduces Weather Balls
keyMoments.description: Haredas shows Nami the Weather Ball technology, explaining how they can store clouds and create weather phenomena. He scolds Nami when she suggests weaponizing them.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Haredas as Nami's mentor and introduces the technology that will become central to her future abilities.
keyMoments.quote: Don't even think about it! Using Weather Balls as weapons could be disastrous!

reveals.information: Haredas can manipulate weather using specialized technology and Weather Balls
Haredas is kind-hearted, willing to lower his prices drastically to help people in need

relationships.description: Haredas becomes Nami's mentor in weather manipulation, teaching her about Weatheria's technology.

evolutionMoments.description: Haredas rescues Nami and begins showing her weather manipulation techniques.
